TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewRowPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GridViewRowPresenterBase

Docs.summary: Represents an object that specifies the layout of a row of data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The GridViewRowPresenter and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classes support the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
## Examples The following example shows how to use a GridViewRowPresenter to style rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
[!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#GridViewRowPresenter](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/t-system.windows.control_27_1.xaml)] [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#GridViewRowPresenter](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/t-system.windows.control_27_1.xaml)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Size ArrangeOverride(valuetype System.Windows.Size arrangeSize) cil managed

Docs.param: The area to use to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A>.
Docs.summary: Positions the content of a row according to the size of the corresponding objects.
Docs.returns: The actual that is used to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A>.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the data content to display in a row.
Docs.value: The object that represents the content of a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The typical usage of the in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to place it in a of a control. The template binds the Content property to a property of the control by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). The following example shows how to bind the Content property of a to the property of a control. [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)] [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)] ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||

Docs.summary: Determines the area that is required to display the row.
Docs.returns: The actual of the area that displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A>.
